name: Rubiks Digital
description:
Digital Innovation Group providing training programs and consulting on digital innovation discovery, execution and scaling.
Your partner for finding business and marketing strategies with technical know-how around digital transformation. Our strength is to understand your business goals and help you vision, build and market digital services.
We have expertize to work with you from products dream to execution or focus on specific areas of your needs: brainstorming & validation, strategy & roadmapping, research & development, user experience, optimization, marketing and scaling.
